wikipedia_page.main: Major Adrian Consett Stephen MC (1894–1918) was an Australian artillery officer and playwright. He was awarded the Military Cross during World War I.

link_mentions.page: List of playwrights by nationality and year of birth

response: * Adrian Consett Stephen  (1894–1918), son of Consett, grandson of Montague, awarded the Croix de Guerre at the Somme and the Military Cross at Passchendaele before being killed in action in Ypres.
